Description: This storymap aims to investigate any relationships between park locations, household median income, and White and Black or African American population distributions in Raleigh census tracts. Raleigh has over 200 parks and Raleigh's Recreation and Cultural Resources Department's mission is to: establish and advance an equitable and inclusive community for all and to bring people to parks and parks to people!

Chapter: Chapter 1: Black or African American and White Population Distributions in Raliegh Census Tracts
Description: William Peace University was founded in 1857. It's motto is Esse quam videri - "To be, rather than to seem".

Chapter: Chapter 2: Income Distribution in Raleigh Census Tracts
Description: These plots display total population per census trac and median income distribution based on overall median household income, White alone median household income, and Black or African American alone median household income in Raleigh Census Tracts in 2021

Chapter: Chapter 3: Raleigh Parks Compared to Differnce in White and Black or African American Popultion Distributions
Description: This plot displays the differnce in White and Black or African American popultion distribution in Raleigh Census Tracts. The locations of Raliegh Park points and areas are shown overlayed on the demographic data. This provides visual insight into park locations compared the the demograhics in Raleigh. From here, patterns and relationships can start to be formed; however, more detailed analysis is required to begin drawing conclusions
